participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

pstr_irritations_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you been able to control irritations in your life? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_way_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you felt that things were going your way? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_unexpect_upset_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_unable_control_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_top_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you felt that you were on top of things? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_overcome_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_outside_control_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you been angered because of things that were outside of your control? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_not_cope_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_feel_stress_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you felt nervous and "stressed"? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_confidence_p.Description: In the last month, how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems? | 0=Never; 1=Almost Never; 2=Sometimes; 3=Fairly Often; 4=Very Often; 777=Refuse to Answer

pstr_ss_pr.Description: prorate the  sum of the 10 questions
